DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine lipidomic profile endometrial fluid , predict endometrial receptivity .
DOC.criteria: Oocyte donor undergo control ovarian stimulation Regular menstrual cycle abnormal karyotype generally healthy BMI 1929 Kg/m2 ( inclusive ) 18 35 year old . Exclusion criterion : patient diagnose endometriosis and/or endometritis .
